bug.author: bee-san

comments.comment: Issue-Label Bot is automatically applying the label bug to this issue, with a confidence of 0.98. Please mark this comment with üëç or üëé to give our bot feedback! Links: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/marketplace/issue-label-bot>app homepage</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://mlbot.net/data/Ciphey/Ciphey>dashboard</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/hamelsmu/MLapp>code</denchmark-link> for this bot.
This is caused by - { as it is not in quotes. --- params: regex: regex: - "FLAG{*.}" - "CTF{*.}" - "HTB{.*}" - "THM{.*}" is correct.
This functionality was moved into the regexlist checler
